PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames

AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description:
Natalia Pundyk is a Polish interior designer renowned for her innovative approach to creating harmonious spaces. With expertise in interior, commercial, retail, and architectural design, she has established a diverse portfolio that reflects her commitment to functionality and aesthetics. Her work experience includes roles as a freelance interior designer for private and public spaces, chief architectural designer at Art Village DVLP in Texas, USA, and workspace designer at SoftServe.

Through her dedication and creativity, Natalia has made a significant impact on the interior design industry, earning recognition and appreciation from clients and peers alike.

tile1.title: Concept Development
tile1.content: We start with understanding your vision and translating it into actionable design concepts.

tile2.title: Space Planning
tile2.content: Optimizing your space for both functionality and aesthetic appeal.

tile3.title: Material Selection
tile3.content: Curating premium materials that balance quality, sustainability and budget.

tile4.title: Final Execution
tile4.content: Bringing the design to life with meticulous attention to detail.
